transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Namaskar sir, Rajat baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Kaise hain sir? Haan, kaun baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Rajat baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se sir. Haan bataiye Rajat.
Executive: Aapne customer care pe call kiya tha sir. Sir jaan sakta hun kya issue aa raha hai services ke related?
Customer: Hai yaar plastic scrap hai hamare paas mein uska recycle reselling ke liye wo chahiye matlab scrap buyer chahiye plastic ke liye, plastic waste kharidne wale.
Executive: Plastic waste kharidne wale?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai. Matlab aapke paas scrap hai to iske liye sir to meri ye primary number par baat hoti thi pehle to bataiye ye aapka hi number hai ya aur koi hai jo person handle karte hain?
Customer: Nahi main hi handle kar raha hun, bataiye.
Executive: Kyunki meri aapse kai baar baat hui hai sir mujhe hi call kar lete hain aapne customer care par call kiya tha na sir isliye.
Customer: To aapko call kiya tha internet pe nikal ke udhar se chala gaya isme.
Executive: Kyunki main hi aapka account manager hun na sir.
Customer: Aapka kya naam hai bhai?
Executive: Rajat hai, Rajat Tiwari sir.
Customer: Rajat Tiwari?
Executive: Haan. Pata nahi yaar mujhe hamare yahan pe IndiaMART jo handle kar rahe hote hain wo alag hain.
Customer: Achcha. Kaun se number pe baat hoti thi aapki?
Executive: Meri primary number par baat hoti hai ye jo hai 99 se start hai 100 piche hai.
Customer: 11100
Executive: 100 100
Customer: 1100 wahi 1100 aap 100 bol rahe ho. Theek hai.
Executive: Haan. To aapka concern abhi aap mujhe bataenge kya hai issue aap mujhe bataiye ek baar.
Customer: Sir mere paas mein scrap hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan. Wo Rudrapur se mere ko Rudrapur mein plastic scrap ke jo dealers hain jo kharid le usko unka number chahiye details.
Executive: Sir aise aapko scrap bechna hai wo main samajh gaya. Dekhiye main yahan par aapka product add kara sakta hun iske related agar aapko aise kahin aas pass hi kisi local ko bechna hai to aise to hum number provide nahi kara payenge lekin main yahan product add kar sakta hun uska jo bhi uski requirement aayegi wo aap nahi nahi product add nahi karna mujhe product add wagera nahi karwana mere ko to dealer ka number chahiye bas.
Customer: Scrap dealer ka number chahiye?
Executive: Scrap dealer aapke number hote to hain IndiaMART ke upar yaar wahin se to call aaya hai mere paas mein.
Executive: Ek second. Aapki website pe listed hai.
Customer: Main achcha ek cheez ye batao mujhe meri company ka number aapke paas mein hai?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Mere ko kuch aur koi aur service agar chahiye kisi aur buyer se connect karna hai main kya kar nahi sakta?
Executive: Aapko connect karna hai wo kar sakte hain aap.
Customer: Buyer se connect karne dekhiye sir yahan par buyer se aapko agar connect karna hai to wo aapko buylead consume karni hogi uske liye ya fir calls inquiry aayengi tab aapko aap connect kar sakte hain. Rajat main samajh gaya aap mere ko koi product nahi add karwana plastic scrap ka.
Executive: Haan wo main bilkul main uske liye nahi kar raha hun sir wo aapko add nahi karana hai kyunki aapka service related agar aapko kuch bechna hai aur aap buyer search kar rahe hain uske liye to wo aap aise kar sakte hain buylead consume karke ya fir uske liye calls or inquiries aayengi calls inquiries tabhi aayenge jab product add hoga buylead aap directly bhi search kar sakte hain agar koi scrap kharidne wala ho to.
Customer: Chaliye.
Executive: To sir ye aapka jo concern hai use close kar dun agar aap chahte hain to.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji kar dijiye theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai aur aapko feedback ke liye ek mail ya SMS aayega to us par aap yes kar dijiyega sir. Theek hai sir aur koi issue hai to?
Customer: Nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs plastic scrap dealer numbers in Rudrapur.

- Wants to connect with other buyers.



Resolution:

- Executive explained product addition process.

- Explained buylead consumption for connecting with buyers.



Next Steps: 

- Feedback link will be sent to the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- scrap dealers, buyleads, product addition
